column4: That's bad GUI design right there. "Connection options". Connection to what?!
Well it gives you once you open it
gives you the options
Aha, judging by the port number 9091, it wants to connect to the Transmission server.
Should I change it? To what?
I don't know. Maybe try putting "localhost" in "remote host".
Don't you have the same thing? What are you connected to?
localhost gives me some kind of 'unauthorized' error
Try entering your user name and password as well.
'Error: 401 Unauthorized user'
Well it's a start :)
I'll try another torrent client, do you know any that are good?
I'm very happy with Deluge.
I will be installing that momentarily.
Can you quickly point me to the Deluge installation directory. It's asking me what to open the link with and I want to select Deluge.
/usr/bin/deluge
Almost all programs are in /usr/bin
SWEET! It's working :D Thanks, man.
No problem, glad I could help :)
Anything I should do with Deluge to configure or anything like that?
Not really, unless you want to set scheduling or throttling options.
